text: John A. Torbett (born May 21, 1956) is a Republican member of the North Carolina General Assembly.http://votesmart.org/candidate/biography/92622/john- torbett#.VWvdY2TBzGc He represents the 108th district.http://ncchamber.capwiz.com/ncchamber/bio/id/64181 On March 3, 2017, Torbett filed a bill H249 entitled Economic Terrorism which would make the civil protest method of Boycott a felony and entitle the target to recover $50,000 or triple damages, whichever is greater. http://www.ncleg.net/Sessions/2017/Bills/House/PDF/H249v0.pdf ==References== Category:Living people Category:North Carolina Republicans Category:21st- century American politicians Category:1956 births
title: John Torbett
